meanings.definition: A type of joint in which a conical peg fits into a socket.
meanings.sent1: The gomphosis of the tooth into the jawbone provides stability.
meanings.sent2: The dentist explained how the gomphosis of the tooth works in the mouth.
meanings.sent3: The gomphosis of the puzzle piece into its place was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The gomphosis of the key into the lock was smooth and precise.
meanings.sent5: The gomphosis of the bone into the joint was like a perfect puzzle piece fitting snugly.
